tool.name: xhmm normalize
tool.description: Apply PCA factors in order to normalize read depth matrix

param.name: PCnormalizeMethod
param.label: Method to choose which prinicipal components are removed for data normalization

param.name: numPCtoRemove
param.label: Number of highest principal components to filter out

param.name: PVE_mean_factor
param.label: Remove all principal components that individually explain more variance than this factor times the average (in the original PCA-ed data)

param.name: PVE_contrib
param.label: Remove the smallest number of principal components that explain this percent of the variance (in the original PCA-ed data)

data.name: normalizeOutput
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: Normalized read-depth matrix output file

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool uses XHMM_ to apply PCA factors and normalize the read depth matrix.
.. _XHMM: http://atgu.mgh.harvard.edu/xhmm/index.shtml
------
**Citation**
For the underlying tool, please cite:
Menachem Fromer and Shaun M. Purcell. Using XHMM software to detect copy number variation in whole-exome sequencing data. In Current Protocols in Human Genetics. John Wiley and Sons, Inc., 2014
